articles.author: Mike Wall
articles.title: 'We will prioritize sending American astronauts to Mars': Trump's pick for NASA chief puts focus on the Red Planet - Space.com
articles.description: "We can chart a course for Mars in line with the president's vision to return to the moon before the Chinese can get there and figure out the space economy and do the other things."
articles.content:
Donald Trump's pick for NASA chief shares the president's ambitious Mars goals.
In his inaugural address on Jan. 20, Trump said the U.S. "will pursue our manifest destiny into the stars, launching A… [+5908 chars]
